dct_title_s: A new and accurate map of North America laid down according to the latest and most approved observations, and discoveries
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Produced for Universal magazine. Engraved by: R.W. Seale. Shows by color the possessions of the British, French, and Spanish. Inset: Hudson' Bay (scale [ca. 1:38,000,000]).
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : Univ. Mag., J. Hinton, Newgate Street, [1763]
